# shouldShowLinkedPeople

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the person view should display data from person records that are linked with the person record being displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldShowLinkedPeople: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Linked records represent the same actual person. They often come from different sources, but may also come from the same source.

## Displaying Person Properties

- **displayedPerson**: The person displayed by the person view.
- **displayedProperties**: Identifies the set of properties (such as name or telephone number) of [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABPersonViewController/displayedPerson] the receiver displays.
